name: Application Icons (iOS & Android)
description:
In this file you will be able to automate the process of exporting icons for Android, iOS and PWA's applications to the developers of your team.


Just replace the icon you want in the master component, and then export the components, which will already be organized into folders for each type of environment (remember that the organization of this file is based on Flutter applications, if you want to change sizes and nomenclatures, feel free).


Android

res
  mipmap-mdpi > ...
  mipmap-hdpi > ...
  mipmap-xdpi > ...
  mipmap-xxdpi > ...
  mipmap-xxxdpi > ...


iOS

AppIcon.appiconset > ...


PWA

assets > ...


To have full access, duplicate this file. Don't forget to leave your like.
